Question: StreamUnlimited Engineering Gmbh CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
StreamUnlimited Engineering Gmbh

Product: Stream2Go

- Cost optimized HW/SW solution with predefined builds for fast time to market
- Three build options: Chromecast, Apple Siri and Music
- Features Spotify Connect, TIDAL Connect, Amazon Music, DAB+/FM, and more

CES 2024 Showcase:
- StreamAnalytics: aggregated data acquisition for valuable market insights
- Dolby Atmos FlexConnect: optimize Dolby Atmos experience regardless of speaker placement

Venue: The Venetian (Suite to be announced on Jan 8th)
Contact: tradeshows@streamunlimited.com
Summary_cn:
StreamUnlimited Engineering Gmbh

产品：Stream2Go

- 成本优化的硬件/软件解决方案，预定义构建以实现快速上市时间
- 三个构建选项：Chromecast，Apple Siri和Music
- 特点：Spotify Connect，TIDAL Connect，Amazon Music，DAB+/FM等

CES 2024展示：
- StreamAnalytics：用于获取有价值的市场洞察力的聚合数据采集
- Dolby Atmos FlexConnect：优化Dolby Atmos体验，无论扬声器放置位置如何

地点：威尼斯人酒店（套房将于1月8日公布）
联系人：tradeshows@streamunlimited.com
